actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend title 23 of the United States Code to permit States whose highway trust fund apportionments have been withheld through impoundment to construct certain highways in advance of receipt of the impounded funds.

summary.text: Authorizes States whose highway trust fund apportionments have been withheld through impoundment to construct qualified highways in advance of receipt of the impounded funds. (Amends 23 U.S.C. 115)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 23 of the United States Code to permit States whose highway trust fund apportionments have been withheld through impoundment to construct certain highways in advance of receipt of the impounded funds.
